meanings.definition: A thick layer of cream on top of milk.
meanings.sent1: The chef carefully skimmed off the cremor from the milk.
meanings.sent2: I love to scoop up the cremor and enjoy it with my dessert.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten left tiny paw prints in the cremor on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun painted the sky with hues of pink and orange, resembling a creamy cremor.
meanings.sent5: The cremor on the milk looked like a fluffy cloud floating on a sea of white.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic cream used for moisturizing the skin.
meanings.sent1: After washing her face, she applied a thin layer of cremor to keep her skin soft.
meanings.sent2: The store offers a variety of cremor products for different skin types.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, but instead of a bunny, it was a tube of cremor!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a soothing cremor, spreading warmth and comfort to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The cremor glided smoothly over her skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and hydrated.
